title: GET_CALMING_QUAD_BOUNDS
content:
0xFF60E63// GetCalmingQuadBounds
BOOL GET_CALMING_QUAD_BOUNDS(int waterQuad, int* minX, int* minY, int* maxX, int* maxY);Parameters:waterQuad: The calming quad indexminX: The minX coordinateminY: The minY coordinatemaxX: The maxX coordinatemaxY: The maxY coordinateReturns: Returns true on success. Bounds are undefined on failureExamples:Lualocal success, minX, minY, maxX, maxY = GetCalmingQuadBounds(1)
codeBlocks:
// GetCalmingQuadBounds
BOOL GET_CALMING_QUAD_BOUNDS(int waterQuad, int* minX, int* minY, int* maxX, int* maxY);
local success, minX, minY, maxX, maxY = GetCalmingQuadBounds(1)
